instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL 'recharts' immediately. It is required for the dashboard charts.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts in index.css.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for the Lead Score and Phone Numbers. Import it from Google Fonts.
The 'Lead Score' should be the visual anchor of the row. Use a circular progress indicator or a bold colored badge.
For the 'AI Message' generation, use a typewriter effect or a skeleton loader to simulate 'thinking'.
The 'Upload' section should be a large, dashed-border dropzone that feels tactile.
Do not use gradients for the background. Keep it clean white/slate.
Ensure the 'Lead Details' opens in a Sheet (Side Panel) so the user doesn't lose their place in the table.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic 'Bootstrap' looks. Use custom padding and specific border colors.
universal_guidelines.interaction: Every button must have a hover and active state. No dead clicks.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high. Use slate-600 for secondary text, not slate-400.
